name: Soldier Yōki
description:
Soldier Yōki, is an indie, action and third-person shooter game. Solo or cooperative, up to 4 players, walk the different scenery, with various game experiences.
Face the Alien Alliance and be victorious over the Boss in order to win the game.

Various maps:
Walk through the different maps of the game, to live a new experience with each game. In colorful or dark universes, be an attacker or defender on some. Lose yourself in science fiction worlds, observe and use the environment to allow yourself victory.

Character:
Play as a soldier, accompanied by these brothers in arms to bring down the Alien alliance with your firearm for distance and your lightsaber for melee. Use your dash ability as well as your soldier powers such as fireball, your care for yourself and your friends, the grenade as well as your defensive wall to try to protect yourself in the most difficult moments.

Concept:
The goal is to survive the Alien alliance. During the battle, the single player mode and the co-op mode are different, but remain the same goal:
- Fighting and defeating are the main objectives, but the path will be perilous.
- Observe and use your environment wisely.

Are you ready for battle?
